snippet: The neighborhood mourned the loss of the shops on White Plains Road to a five-alarm blaze, which could be seen for miles and disrupted subway service Thursday morning.
abstract: Bronx neighborhood mourns loss of small storefront businesses on White Plains Road to a five-alarm fire; blaze, which was seen for miles, disrupted subway service when 225th Street station was enveloped in smoke.
lead_paragraph: The neighborhood mourned the loss of the shops on White Plains Road to a five-alarm blaze, which could be seen for miles and disrupted subway service Thursday morning.

headline.seo: Five-Alarm Fire Devastates a Row of Businesses in the Bronx
headline.main: Fire Devastates Businesses in Bronx, and Neighborhood Laments Loss
headline.print_headline: Fire Devastates Row of Businesses in Bronx, and Neighborhood Laments Loss
